description: This is the main application class for the Internet Banking Service Registry, a Spring Boot application configured as a Eureka server for service discovery in a microservices architecture.

classes.name: InternetBankingServiceRegistryApplication
classes.description: Main class for the Eureka server setup, enabling service registry for microservices.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Spring Boot application that starts the Eureka server.
